author: Eric Pincus
title: How Much Money Will NBA Players Will Lose Due to Coronavirus Pandemic?
description: LOS ANGELES — Stopping the  NBA  season was an easy decision for Commissioner Adam Silver. Once players started contracting the COVID-19 virus, the health and safety of the league took precedence over the potential financial repercussions...
content:
